statements: SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM public_transport_routes WHERE start_location = 'Station A';
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes WHERE schedule_time > '08:00:00' ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, end_location FROM public_transport_routes WHERE end_location LIKE '%City%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location, schedule_time FROM public_transport_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes WHERE schedule_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '18:00:00';
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes ORDER BY schedule_time DESC, start_location ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_routes FROM public_transport_routes WHERE start_location = 'Central Station';
SELECT MAX(route_id) AS max_route_id FROM public_transport_routes;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes WHERE end_location = 'City Center';
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM public_transport_schedules WHERE departure_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes WHERE start_location LIKE '%Airport%';
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes WHERE start_location = 'City A';
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes WHERE end_location = 'Suburb B' ORDER BY route_id DESC;

SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time, route_name FROM public_transport_schedules s INNER JOIN public_transport_routes r ON s.route_id = r.route_id WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT r.route_id, r.route_name, s.departure_time, s.arrival_time FROM public_transport_routes r LEFT JOIN public_transport_schedules s ON r.route_id = s.route_id WHERE s.schedule_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules;
SELECT stop_name, location FROM stops;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY start_location DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE departure_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT stop_id, stop_name, location FROM stops WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY stop_name ASC;
SELECT routes.route_name, schedules.departure_time, stops.location FROM routes JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id JOIN stops ON schedules.schedule_id = stops.stop_id;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT s.schedule_id, r.route_name, s.departure_time FROM schedules s JOIN routes r ON s.route_id = r.route_id;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B'

SELECT schedules.schedule_id, routes.route_name, stops.stop_name FROM schedules JOIN routes ON schedules.route_id = routes.route_id JOIN route_stops ON routes.route_id = route_stops.route_id JOIN stops ON route_stops.stop_id = stops.stop_id

SELECT schedules.schedule_id, routes.route_name, stops.stop_name, schedule.departure_time, schedule.arrival_time FROM schedules JOIN routes ON schedules.route_id = routes.route_id JOIN route_stops ON routes.route_id = route_stops.route_id JOIN stops ON route_stops.stop_id = stops.stop_id ORDER BY schedule.departure_time
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM routes WHERE starting_point='City A';
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT routes.route_name, schedules.departure_time, schedules.arrival_time FROM routes INNER JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id;
SELECT driver_name, license_number FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM routes WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus' ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT passenger_name, ticket_number FROM passengers WHERE ticket_number LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY passenger_id ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time, day_of_week FROM schedules WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
